response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 北海道横断 幽界黙示録編
response.overview: Daisuke Morishima, Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, and ZeNrA, who have an absolute following among young people on the Internet video distribution service, take on the challenge of filming terrifying haunted places in this fourth installment of their horror documentary. This is the final part of a two-part series in which the four psychic mavericks challenge Hokkaido with high-tech equipment and acts of blasphemy in order to capture the spirits.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human: Hokkaido Horizontal Passage Revelation Edition

titles.title: Psychic vs Human: Hokkaido Ōdan - Yūkai Mokushiroku-hen
